loader.greyLeftBottom: Or choose a numbered feature button

onloadCopy.point1text1: Lenovo ThinkSystem SD650 V3 is based on our next generation Lenovo Neptune™ direct water cooling platform leveraging four 4th Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors. Our market-leading Direct Water Cooling (DWC) design allows for extreme performance in very dense packaging. This dual-node tray is designed for high performance computing (HPC), large-scale cloud, heavy simulations and modeling workloads.

point3text.point3text3: 2x 3rd Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Family processors with liquid-cooled cold plates
point3text.point3text4: 4x NVIDIA® A100 GPUs with liquid-cooled plates
point3text.point3text6: Up to 24x 2.5-inch hot-swap drive bays: 24x SAS/SATA or 24x AnyBay or 24x NVMe

point4text.point4heading: Designed to run two of the highest core count 4th generation Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors, the SD650 V3 powers through demanding HPC workloads. Because water cooling removes more heat more efficiently, CPUs can run in accelerated mode non-stop, getting up to 10% greater performance from the CPU.
point4text.point4text1: 2x Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors with liquid-cooled cold plates
point4text.point4text3: 2x Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors with liquid-cooled cold plates

point5text.point5heading: This uniquely designed water cooling system removes heat constantly from all major components including CPUs, memory DIMMs, drives and PCIe adapters for maximum performance.
point5text.point5text1: Dripless quick connects allow nodes to be removed without disrupting other nodes in the chassis
point5text.point5text2: Parallel water loops ensure <5°C ΔT between CPUs for maximum performance
point5text.point5text3: Direct water cooling for 2.5 inch NVMe drives and PCIe adapters
point5text.point5text4: Direct water cooling for memory DIMMs with insulated slots
point5text.point5text5: Direct water cooling for memory DIMMs with insulated slots
point5text.point5text6: 1x liquid cooled M.2 NVMe SSD for both operating system boot and storage functions
point5text.point5text7: 1x liquid cooled M.2 NVMe SSD for both operating system boot and storage functions

point6text.point6heading: Lenovo brings a decade of experience in direct water cooling with a meticulous focus on low-pressure drop and best-in-class reliability. Copper and brazed connections guarantee leak-free operations at extreme scale and stainless steel dripless quick connects for rapid node removal without disruption. The superior water loop design enables up to 45°C inlet temperatures for highest energy reuse efficiency. Parallel loops ensure temperature uniformity of less than 5°C, minimizing thermal jitter and maximizing application performance.

point7text.point7text1: Designed to run four of the highest core-count 4th generation Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors, the SD650 V3 powers through demanding HPC workloads.
point7text.point7text14: Because water cooling removes more heat more efficiently, CPUs can run in accelerated mode non-stop, getting up to 10% greater performance from the CPU.

point8text.point8headingText: The enclosure offers a power supply choice for customers –either air-cooled power supplies that run with high heat recovery of up to 90%, or water-cooledpower suppliesthat provides extreme heat recovery of up to 95%.
point8text.point8text1: DWC High Heat Recovery 6 or 9 air-cool power supplies
point8text.point8text2: DWC Extreme Heat Recovery 2 or 3 DWC power supplies
point8text.point8text4: DWC High Heat Recovery 2 or 3 DWC power supplies

point9text.point9text1: One DW612S Enclosure accomdates up to 6 water-cooled trays. Its ultra-dense design delivers a single node per U of rack space, providing three times the density of an equivalent air-cooled product.

point10text.point10text1: Lenovo HPC & AI Software Stack provides our HPC customers with a fully tested and supported open-source software stack to enable their administrators and users for the most effective and environmentally sustainable consumption of Lenovo Supercomputing capabilities.
point10text.point10text7: The modular Lenovo HPC & AI Software Stack offers specialized components for development, such as Intel OneAPI, NVIDIA SDK and CUDA-X AI, alongside energy optimization and job scheduling tools. Our Confluent management system and LiCO Web portal provide an interface designed to abstract the users from the complexity of HPC cluster orchestration and AI workloads management, making open-source HPC software consumable for every customer. The stack includes system management, provisioning and monitoring tools for the HPC clusters.
point10text.point10text9: 2x faster boot time to OS screen

point12text.point12headingText: The dripless connectors attach to the manifold in the rear of the chassis as shown.
point12text.point12text2: Also supports up to 24 Intel® Optane™ Persistent Memory 200 Series modules designed for cloud and databases, in-memory analytics and content delivery networks.

point13text.point13text1: Simplify your IT transformation and grow your business your way In today's world, change can happen overnight. Lenovo's Solution Services Group offers a complete suite of answers to even your most challenging business questions.
point13text.point13text6: Our proven experts guide you on your digital transformation and help you reach your unique strategic and business goals through:
point13text.point13text11: Accelerate time to productivity to focus on your customers and growing business.
point13text.point13_li4_2: Hardware Environments Tailored To Your Specific Business Needs

point14text.point14text3: 2x Intel® Xeon® Platinum processor with liquid-cooled cold plates
point14text.point14text4: 2x Intel® Xeon® Platinum processor with liquid-cooled cold plates
point14text.point14text6: Up to 24x 2.5-inch hot-swap drive bays: 24x SAS/SATA or 24x AnyBay or 24x NVMe

point15text.point15headingText: Lenovo ThinkSystem SD650-N V2 is based on our fourth generation Lenovo Neptune™ direct water cooling platform leveraging two 3rd Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors with NVIDIA HGX A100 4-GPU acceleration and NVIDIA HDR InfiniBand networking. The combination of NVIDIA breakthrough acceleration technology with the market-leading Lenovo water cooling solution results in extreme performance in very dense packaging.
point15text.point15text1: 25 Gb SFP28 Ethernet port with shared NIC feature for Lenovo XClarity Controller
point15text.point15text2: 25 Gb SFP28 Ethernet port with shared NIC feature for Lenovo XClarity Controller

point16text.point16headingText: The water cooling manifolds connect to a Cooling Distribution Unit (CDU) from outside or inside the rack combined with dripless disconnects deliver a reliable and highly efficient cooling subsystem for demanding workloads.
point16text.point16text1: With a growing awareness of carbon footprint and the impact on global warming, energy efficiency is now an important consideration when planning and operating data centers.
point16text.point16text2: To allow customers to have a fully liquid cooled compute solution, Lenovo now offers liquid cooled power supplies. This now results in up to 95% removal of the heat generated by the servers using liquid cooling.
point16text.point16text3: With direct liquid cool systems, heat is more efficiently removed from the data center, requiring less power on the cooling side and enabling concepts for energy re-use.

point2text.point2text1: Lenovo ThinkSystem SD650 V3 is delivered as fully integrated Lenovo Scalable Infrastucture (LeSI) solution. It is pre-integrated, pre-cabled and pre-loaded with the best recipe and optionally an OS-image and tested at the rack level to ensure a reliable delivery and minimize installation time in the customer data center. Each Lenovo rack contains up to six DW612S enclosures. The water cooling mainfolds connect to a Cooling Distribution Unit (CDU) from outside or inside the rack.

point17text.point17text1: The 6U ThinkSystem DW612S Enclosure accommodates up to six compute trays for either the ThinkSystem SD650 V3 (up to 12x) or the SD650-I V3 (5X). Customers can mix the systems within the chassis for maximum flexibility.
point17text.point17text2: The Lenovo ThinkSystem SD650 V3 server and the DW612S Direct Water Cooling (DWC) enclosure deliver super-charged performance and unparalleled energy savings.
point17text.point17text3: The system supports up to 50°C water intake and can remove up to 95% of the internal heat at lower temperatures.
point17text.point17text4: Customers can save up to 40% on energy costs over non-optimized air-cooled systems that require constant fan usage.
